title: Trade Talk! Updated Rest of Season Rankings and a CIN-CLE Preview (09/16 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
What is Michael Thomas's trade value (4:55)? What is Jonathan Taylor's trade value (9:05)? Is Taylor a first round pick if we redraft today? ... News and notes (14:00)! Updating you on some RB injuries, and do we have an Allen Robinson problem? Then Heath weighs in on his favorite waiver wire RBs (20:15) and we do some player debates (24:40)! Ekeler vs. Drake vs. Taylor! Thielen vs. Ridley vs. Godwin! Allen vs. Watson vs. Ryan! ... CIN-CLE preview (37:30): Are we starting all three RBs and all four WRs? Are they better than the waiver wire RBs? ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com and your Apple Podcast questions (55:40)
Listen to the brand new Fantasy Football Today in 5 podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/fantasy-football-today-in-5/id1528634304
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow the new FFT Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/FFToday
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @YardsPerGretch, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCviK78rIWXhZdFzJ1Woi7Fg/videos
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Trade Talk! Updated Rest of Season Rankings and a CIN-CLE Preview (09/16 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Trade values for Jonathan Taylor, Michael Thomas, Austin Ekeler, Chris Carson and so many more. Plus we preview CIN-CLE and we answer your emails and Apple Podcast questions.
